抑郁情绪.3: 不用言语也可以从表情，姿势，声音或欲哭中流露出这种情绪
抑郁情绪.4: 病人的自发言语和非语言表达（表情，动作）几乎完全表现为这种情绪

有罪感.1: 责备自己，感到自己已连累他人
有罪感.2: 认为自己犯了罪，或反复思考以往的过失和错误
有罪感.3: 认为疾病是对自己错误的惩罚，或有罪恶妄想
有罪感.4: 罪恶妄想伴有指责或威胁性幻想

自杀.2: 希望自己已经死去，或常想与死亡有关的事

入睡困难.1: 主诉入睡困难，上床半小时后仍不能入睡（要注意平时病人入睡的时间）
入睡困难.2: 主诉每晚均有入睡困难

睡眠不深.2: 半夜（晚12点钟以前）曾醒来（不包括上厕所）

早醒.1: 有早醒，比平时早醒1小时，但能重新入睡

工作和兴趣.2: 自发地直接或间接表达对活动、工作或学习失去兴趣，如感到没精打彩，犹豫不决，不能坚持或需强迫自己去工作或劳动
工作和兴趣.3: 病室劳动或娱乐不满3小时
工作和兴趣.4: 因疾病而停止工作，住院病者不参加任何活动或者没有他人帮助便不能完成病室日常事务

迟缓.1: 精神检查中发现轻度迟缓
迟缓.2: 精神检查中发现明显迟缓
迟缓.4: 完全不能回答问题（木僵）

激越.2: 明显心神不定或小动作多
激越.3: 不能静坐，检查中曾起立
激越.4: 搓手、咬手指、头发、咬嘴唇

精神性焦虑.3: 表情和言谈流露出明显忧虑

躯体性焦虑.2: 中度，有肯定的上述症状
躯体性焦虑.3: 重度，上述症状严重，影响生活或需要处理

胃肠道症状.1: 食欲减退，但不需他人鼓励便自行进食
胃肠道症状.2: 进食需他人催促或请求和需要应用泻药或助消化药

全身症状.1: 四肢，背部或颈部沉重感，背痛、头痛、肌肉疼痛、全身乏力或疲倦

疑病.3: 有疑病妄想，并常因疑病而去就诊

体重减轻.0: 不减轻或一周内体重减轻1斤以内
体重减轻.1: 患者述可能有体重减轻或一周内体重减轻超过0.5kg
体重减轻.2: 肯定体重减轻或一周内体重减轻超过1kg

自知力.0: 知道自己有病，表现为忧郁
自知力.1: 知道自己有病，但归咎伙食太差、环境问题、工作过忙、病毒感染或需要休息

Loss of Interest.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by little interest or pleasure in doing things over the past two weeks
Loss of Interest.1: Bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Loss of Interest.2: Bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Loss of Interest.3: Bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks

Depressed Mood.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless over the past two weeks
Depressed Mood.1: Bothered by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Depressed Mood.2: Bothered by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Depressed Mood.3: Bothered by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks

Sleep Problems.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much over the past two weeks
Sleep Problems.1: Bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Sleep Problems.2: Bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Sleep Problems.3: Bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks

Fatigue or Low Energy.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by feeling tired or having little energy over the past two weeks
Fatigue or Low Energy.1: Bothered by feeling tired or having little energy for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Fatigue or Low Energy.2: Bothered by feeling tired or having little energy for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Fatigue or Low Energy.3: Bothered by feeling tired or having little energy nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks

Appetite or Weight Changes.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by poor appetite or overeating over the past two weeks
Appetite or Weight Changes.1: Bothered by poor appetite or overeating for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Appetite or Weight Changes.2: Bothered by poor appetite or overeating for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Appetite or Weight Changes.3: Bothered by poor appetite or overeating nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks

Low Self-Worth.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by feeling bad about oneself or like a failure over the past two weeks
Low Self-Worth.1: Bothered by feeling bad about oneself or like a failure for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Low Self-Worth.2: Bothered by feeling bad about oneself or like a failure for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Low Self-Worth.3: Bothered by feeling bad about oneself or like a failure nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks

Concentration Difficulties.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by trouble concentrating on things like reading or watching TV over the past two weeks
Concentration Difficulties.1: Bothered by trouble concentrating on things like reading or watching TV for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Concentration Difficulties.2: Bothered by trouble concentrating on things like reading or watching TV for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Concentration Difficulties.3: Bothered by trouble concentrating on things like reading or watching TV nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks

Psychomotor Changes.0: Not bothered at all (or 0-1 day) by moving or speaking slowly, or being fidgety or restless over the past two weeks
Psychomotor Changes.1: Bothered by moving or speaking slowly, or being fidgety or restless for several days (or 2-6 days) over the past two weeks
Psychomotor Changes.2: Bothered by moving or speaking slowly, or being fidgety or restless for more than half the days (or 7-11 days) over the past two weeks
Psychomotor Changes.3: Bothered by moving or speaking slowly, or being fidgety or restless nearly every day (or 12-14 days) over the past two weeks
